column3:
NOTE:

I know that this is a similar PR to https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/17389

There is a documented bug in the macOS Github app that I was using to preview my PRs.
Which I believe was force closing some PRs as one side effect.

https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/17389#issuecomment-552053254

@RandyMcMillan \n- Don't tag people in the opening post of your PR. The initial post of the PR will end up in git, and when it's merged, the person will be tagged every time the commit ends up somewhere (for example, when ported to an altcoin).\n- Please stop opening new PRs to replace old PRs for only minimal changes you keep doing this! As [I've told you](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pul
